description: Heavy hiking boots shouldn’t tire you out…the adventure should! With the Lone Peak ALL-WTHR Mid 2, we combined the comfort of a trail runner with the support of a hiking boot, minus the bulk. Treat your feet to our roomy Original FootShape™ Fit and responsive yet soft Altra EGO™ midsole foam. With a grippy MaxTrac™ outsole, you’re ready to conquer a thru-hike or hit your neighborhood dirt loop with confidence.
name: Altra Lone Peak AW Mid 2 - Mens
